td.content: (-) WNL w/ no acute findings suggestive of ICB

observation.value: (-) WNL w/ no acute findings suggestive of ICB

td.content: s:49 yr old m master of ceremony presents with moderate neck pain. he also reports mild blurred vision, moderate nausea, Traumatic Injury - Blunt associated with the moderate neck pain. 1 day ago he sustained a blow to the front of the head.he had no LOC o:Height 71 in, Weight 127 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, CT Head (-) WNL w/ no acute findings suggestive of ICB, ImPACT test Verbal Memory=71,Visual Memory=51,Processing Speed=23.8,Reaction Time=0.75, Eyes = normal pupillary reflex, NAD, Neck = supple w/o TTP, Neuro = CN II-XII WNL w/ no deficits, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Psych = Mood, affect NL, appropriate judgement a:TBI (concussion) p:administered Flexeril - 10 mg po q 8 hrs PRN pain/cramps, performed CT Head, ImPACT test, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed, and ordered rest, and referred patient to family practice/primary care.

content2.Value: CT Head , ImPACT test , and performed E/MALE Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed ,

td.content: s:M aged 49 ys presents for approx. one (1) week f/u after sustaining a mild concussion. he denies blurred vision, nausea and neck pain. Furthermore, he has had no subsequent loss of consciousness (LOC). he has resumed usual state of function. o:Height 71 in, Weight 126 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, ImPACT test Verbal Memory=96,Visual Memory=95,Processing Speed=44,Reaction Time=0.48, HEENT = NCAT, PERRL, C/V = RRR, Abd = Soft, ND, NTTP. BS WNL, Neuro = CN II-XII WNL. No deficits, Neck = Supple, Pulm = CTAB. Good respiratory effort, MS = Extremities x 4 WNL. Strength 5/5, Eyes = normal pupillary reflex a:S/P Concussion (with no loss of consciousness). No sequelae p:performed ImPACT test, and performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed.

content2.Unmatched: No deficits , Neck = Supple , Pulm = CTAB

td.content: Do not IV Fluid and Support
